resources.string:
" Mohamad Albarak is a renowned reciter of the Holy Qur’an. He was born in a village called Shobra Al Namla in Tanta, Egypt.
Mahmoud entered the Qur’an School at the age of four. At 8, he had already memorized the whole Qur’an and at 12, he entered to the religious institute and learnt the ten recitations in Al Azhar.
Mohamad Albarak first recited the Holy Qur’an in his village mosque. In 1944, he entered the official radio station as reciter where he made his first recitation on 16 February 1944. On August 7, 1948, he was nominated Muadhin (Prayer caller) of Sidi Hamza Mosque and then a reciter in the same mosque. He was also supervising recitation centers of Al Gharbia province.
In 1949, Mohamad Albarak was appointed reciter of Sidi Ahmed Al Badaoui of Tanta , of Al Ahmadi Mosque and then of Al Imam Al Hussein Mosque in Cairo by 1955.
Mohamad Albarak was one of the most esteemed reciters of his time. A serial, “Imam Al Moqr’ine”, starring Hassan Youssef, was dedicated to Al Hussary’s life and performances. "

" MuslimCharityApps Privacy Policy All users that download our apps made by MuslimCharityApps, accept the next terms and conditions: MuslimCharityApps is firmly committed to protecting privacy of his users. We respect your privacy and will not collect any personal information ADS : We use AdMob ads in our free apps. http://www.google.com/ads/admob/ – https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners All ads are shown in-app, ads can be banners or interstitial, you will never see an ad out of the apps. We need permissions to access your sensitive personal info ONLY for use directly on your device and without these informations our apps will not be able to function with you. Permissions : * READ_PHONE_STATE : Check if the phone is ringing or a call has ended to pause/unpause the player * ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE : Check if the mobile is online ads, checking for new app version * WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : used to store downloaded Quran mp3 . please feel free to contact us if you have any question about MuslimCharityApps Privacy policy. MuslimCharityApps muslimcharityapps@gmail.com "
